A data transfer object that represents available filter options for log queries, providing lists of filterable values for audit log searches.

## Key Components

- **LogFilterResponse** - Main DTO class with Lombok annotations for data binding
- **eventTypes** - List of available event type filter values
- **toolTypes** - List of available tool type filter values  
- **severities** - List of available severity level filter values
- **organizations** - List of organization filter objects for hierarchical filtering

## Usage Example

```java
// Building a log filter response
LogFilterResponse filterResponse = LogFilterResponse.builder()
    .eventTypes(Arrays.asList("LOGIN", "LOGOUT", "DATA_ACCESS"))
    .toolTypes(Arrays.asList("WEB_APP", "API", "MOBILE"))
    .severities(Arrays.asList("INFO", "WARN", "ERROR"))
    .organizations(organizationList)
    .build();

// Accessing filter options
List<String> availableEvents = filterResponse.getEventTypes();
List<OrganizationFilterResponse> orgs = filterResponse.getOrganizations();
```

This class is typically used in REST API responses to provide frontend applications with the complete set of available filter options for audit log searches, enabling dynamic filter UI generation.
